dcterms:description: A dataset containing binary classification graphs derived from movie collaboration networks, where each graph corresponds to an ego-network for each actor/actress, with edges representing co-appearances in movies.
dcterms:title: IMDB-BINARY (IMDB-B)

dcterms:creator: Chunjing Xiao
Zehua Gou

Fan Zhou
dcterms:description: A dataset containing multi-class classification graphs derived from movie collaboration networks, where each graph corresponds to an ego-network for each actor/actress, with edges representing co-appearances in movies.
dcterms:title: IMDB-MULTI (IMDB-M)

dcterms:creator: Hongteng Xu
Dixin Luo
Lawrence Carin
Hongyuan Zha
dcterms:description: A dataset containing binary classification graphs derived from online discussion threads, where each graph corresponds to a thread and edges represent interactions between users.
dcterms:title: REDDIT-BINARY (REDDIT-B)

dcterms:creator: Haoran Yang

dcterms:description: A dataset containing multi-class classification graphs derived from online discussion threads, where each graph corresponds to a thread and edges represent interactions between users.
dcterms:title: REDDIT-MULTI-5K (REDDIT-M)
